text: humu alladhina kafaru wasaddukum ʿani l-masjidi l-harami wal-hadya maʿkufan an yablugha mahillahu walawla rijalun mu'minuna wanisaon mu'minatun lam taʿlamuhum an tatauhum fatusibakum min'hum maʿarratun bighayri ʿil'min liyud'khila l-lahu fi rahmatihi man yashau law tazayyalu laʿadhabna alladhina kafaru min'hum ʿadhaban aliman
